extension.description:
SponsorBlock browser extension ported to Kodi's YouTube plugin.
SponsorBlock is a crowdsourced project to skip sponsor segments in YouTube videos. Users submit when a sponsor happens and the add-on automatically skips sponsors it knows about.
extension.disclaimer: This is an unoffical port of the SponsorBlock browser extension
